info.title: BOSS' Application Library Manager
info.description: Manages the applications in the BOSS' library for a given team (or the current team).

method.name: buyApplication
method.description: Buy an application for a team.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id or empty to get the current team.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getTeamAppVersion
method.description: Get the team's current application version.

method.name: updateTeamAppVersion
method.description:
Updates the team's application version for the current account to the next declared version (if any).
Returning true doesn't mean that there was an update.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: setTeamAppVersion
method.description: Set the next version of a project for a team. The project must be in the team's library.

parameter.name: $version
parameter.description: The app's version selected by the team.

parameter.name: $teamID
parameter.description: The team id or empty to get the current team.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getAccountAppVersion
method.description: Get the application version for the current account for the current team from the account's folder.
method.returndescription: The app's version. NULL if project version is not set.

method.name: setAccountAppVersion
method.description: Set the project version for the current account for the current team from the account's folder.
